name: Wrath V2
details:
DistortionNew in V2: Top-mount Jacks, Soft-touch relay bypass switch, updated "ghost black polygon" graphics.
The Wrath is inspired by the popular RAT distortion (get it? W.Rat.H??) with a Reutz mod and red led clipping option (which really cranks it to an 11). The reutz mod (The "Sweep" control) adjust the clipping frequency of the gain stage making the tone darker as yout turn it up. Using a genuine NOS LM308 Op-Amp, the tone of this beast is second to none.
Features:
Genuine LM308 Op-Amp.
Handwired Construction 
Quality hand-wired open frame jacks
Power: Standard 9 volt DC/ negative center, NO internal battery option.
3PDT True Bypass Footswitch

Current Draw: ~15mA
https://foxpedal.com/products/wrath-v2-1
